author: The B1M
description:
The Macau we know of today would not exist without one man.
Skip the waitlist and invest in blue-chip art for the very first time by signing up for Masterworks - https://www.masterworks.art/theb1m

Full story here -  https://www.theb1m.com/video/How-China-Built-its-Own-Las-Vegas

This video contains paid promotion for Masterworks.

Additional footage and images courtesy of Zaha Hadid Architects and Dennis Lau & Ng Chun Man Architects.

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through our Get Construction Talking initiative. There’s a video series on our channel and you can find support or donate at - https://www.getconstructiontalking.org/
